title: How does the provisional rank placement system work?
body:
I played my 10 ranked provisionals and won 6 of them but i got bronze 1 however when my friend played his provisionals he won 5 and got gold 3 so is provisionals based on last seasons rank that you achieved and how well you did in the games?

Last year my rank was silver 4 and my friend was platinum 3.

replies.body: yes it uses what rank you were last year as a MAJOR deciding factor.
